entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:31 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low minus 4.
